Question: This person then branched out to star in the only musical of his career, Paint Your Wagon (1969).
Hints: With a production cost of $20 million, (US$47.6 million in 2013 dollars) it was this person's highest budget film to date.
This person is a keen golfer and owns the Tehàma Golf Club.
This person did, however, win the Future Film Festival Digital Award at the Venice Film Festival for the film.
